website_summaries.verdict: Formula that's Paleo diet friendly as well as lactose-free for sensitive stomachs.
pros: A lactose-free alternative to whey or casein
Contains 10 essential amino acids for added health benefits
cons: Some customers found the taste to be too potent

customer_reviews.title: Egg whites without the mess of removing the yolk.
customer_reviews.text: Just started working out on a daily basis. My personal trainer recommended several recipes that included "egg whites". I initially tried separating egg white from the egg yolk with a small funnel. It was very cumbersome and left me with perfectly good egg yolks but not ready to make anything with them. It seemed too wasteful a process. Finding this powder was a true God-send. I mixed about 1-2 tsp of powder with water to match a recipe calling for 3 egg whites. It whipped up and cooked just like regular egg whites. This product is exactly what it says it is...egg whites. Nothing more. Just add water.
customer_reviews.author: Angella

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The supplement facts pictured is not what you receive (which in their defense is stated in the item description). The problem is one serving has 375 mg of sodium while the label on Amazon says 0 mg. 375 mg? That's equivalent to 2 servings of sea salt potato chips...a little more than slightly different from the image.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT'S PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE*I... THE PRICE OF THIS PRODUCT HAS INCREASED $15 SINCE I FIRST PURCHASED IT IN JUNE 2018 (4 months time). I am currently finishing my 3rd bag Goodbye Bulksuppliments. NEXT! I'll take my $$$ someplace else. And the search continues... FINALLY FOUND A PROTEIN POWDER I LIKE... I suffer from many food allergies that keep me out of many protein powders. 100% egg white! I mix it with oatmeal and blended drinks. It's tasteless (to me) and mixes well. Have been through a couple bags of this powder. WILL continue buying.
customer_reviews.author: rhd10_0

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: Since this is tasteless it makes it perfect for my morning smoothies! Much healthier than the sucralose flavored protein powders out there.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Would not mix with water by hand.
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed at the way it mixed. It might be OK for someone using a blender with soy milk or something to that effect but not for someone needing a quick protein supplement right after a workout at the gym. I tried a spoon,shaker bottle, with and without the shaker ball using cold,warm and even hot water and the result was the same. A foamy, clumpy ,undrinkable, glue/sticky like substance. When I let it settle for a minute it would totally separate from the water and lay on the bottom in clumps with almost clear water on top. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A VERIFIED PURCHASE REVIEW.
customer_reviews.text: I’m vegetarian. I need more proteins on my daily diet. I don’t drink this for the flavor of it; but for the benefits it brings. In order to avoid calorie intake I drink it with water. Nevertheless: This protein powder is tasteless, for the most part. Doesn’t clump. Blends beautifully with whatever you choose. No soy. No added anything! Totally Paleo. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Luiza WelchTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: No foam when shaken in Milk ;)
customer_reviews.text: This protein is great. the 1st time i used it i mixed it with water, taste was gross and it foamed up a lot, very hard to drink. Learning from this, i mixed it with almond/coconut milk freaking delicious. I dont understand the 1 stars from the people who use the water. I love how clean & complete this protein is and how well its been working for me, this was my 2nd product from Bulk and Im already on my 4th. I do enjoy how everything is pure with no additives. you can make your own supplements by buying multiple product and mixing your own without all the extra crap from leading brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Blends in smooth with no egg taste.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to add more protein to my diet. I use it in a shake with almond milk, cocoa powder and Monkfruit sweetner. It works and tastes great. There is no egg taste and it blends in smooth and easy. I have been using it for a while now and I like it and will keep on using it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Egg white powder review
customer_reviews.text: Ordering this product, being pure with no additives I expected the taste to be bland or taste different than sweetened products. So I hoped I could find a mix that would make it taste good enough to drink everyday. I mixed it with water and choclate syrup or sugar and coconut milk with same. Still haven't found the right mix. I stopped using it but will start using it again and try to find a mix that works.I workout consistently and was looking for an alternative to whey protein.I was using a Muscle Tech Protein from Walmart which has a cheaper price than other sellers.
customer_reviews.author: David Velez

customer_reviews.title: Solid non-dairy protein
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to protein for making protein shakes. I also use this for making protein pancakes! It doesn't dissolve that well in regular water, so I definitely recommend blending it. The quality is good and the flavor is just slightly bitter, but if you add some sweetness, you won't taste the bitter.
customer_reviews.author: I love French salted butter

customer_reviews.title: Purity for an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: This product is super convenient, paleo/primal friendly, and has no added “stuff.” The quantity and purity that you get for the price is, without question, the best in the industry. I use it for my fitness and overall nutrition. A relative of mine uses this and other Bulk Supplements products to accommodate extreme dietary restrictions and needs, due to a GI disease. He is the healthiest he has been in years. Purity is vital for his health and digestion. Cheers to Bulk Supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ryan Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific product. I prefer flavorless, as you can't go wrong and it can be placed with any kind of fruits and veggies (smoothies) and it never changes the taste - it really is flavorless! You cannot beat getting real protein from egg white.
customer_reviews.author: Julescat

customer_reviews.title: Too salty!
customer_reviews.text: I do enjoy the quality of this protein powder. There are no additives and it's an excellent source of protein. However, it is SO salty that not even fruit can cover up the taste! I know it's naturally occurring salt in the eggs prior to processing, but it's not super palitable. If you're one of those people who enjoys maple syrup on their breakfast sausage, you may be okay with this protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: brennan89

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to work with but exactly as expected in every other way.
customer_reviews.text: The ultra fine powder is very difficult to work with. It's the main cause of the clumping, clogging the zip lock on the bag and powder always being spilled as you use the product. The flavor is light enough to mix with other strong flavors but will still leave noticable flavor in the mixture. None the less, a decent alternative to more common protein powders (you might not be able to digest).
customer_reviews.author: Howard Adams

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like it
customer_reviews.text: Taste like crap and does not blend well even with a magic bullet. Forgot about blending it in a shaker bottle, clumpy and gross. I understand its unflavored but even after adding PB2 its hard to choke down.
customer_reviews.author: Politicking

customer_reviews.title: Good protein, just be sure you know what you are buying.
customer_reviews.text: This was good, however it does not mix well because this is pure egg white protein powder. Also, it tastes sorta like cardboard on its own, but I just mix it in my smoothies so I do not care too much since the flavor gets masked anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Product A+, ziplock C
customer_reviews.text: Used this for keto bread, worked really well, can’t say what the taste was as the entire thing tasted like egg, egg, more egg. Packaging however, was another issue... it just would not close so I put it in an airtight jar.
customer_reviews.author: kribeli

customer_reviews.title: love this protein
customer_reviews.text: this is great protein for shakes as it doesn't froth up like the whey. doesn't add any strange flavor, also much cheaper here than on their website.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use-No weird taste egg white protein
customer_reviews.text: I love the Bulk Supplement Egg White protein. I have been mixing it with Almond Milk in my shaker cup. No clumping at all. No weird taste, after taste, or regurgitation. I found this to be very easy on the stomach as well. Great way to get my protein without cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one.
customer_reviews.text: there are better ways to get the protein you need. I've tried to work with this stuff and it's a pain in the a$$ virtually any way you go about it. Clumpy, foaming, powder sticks to every thing, terrible experience. Easier to just eat eggs. At the end of the day this is just powdered eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Dman

customer_reviews.title: Great for Protein Bars!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for making protein bars. I really dislike the taste of whey products and this has been a great alternative. The only thing I didn't care for was the packaging. I found it very challenging to close and had to transfer the powder to another container for storage.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great but doesn’t mix/Desolve very well
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying egg white protein. I started a whole30 so couldn’t use my regular whey and casein, and wanted to give this a try. The protein is fine except it doesn’t mix :-/ it clumps. I mix it with coconut water but it just doesn’t really mix so that’s the only negative thing. I’m not sure if all egg white protein is like that or not.
customer_reviews.author: Elina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic protein option!
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein! I add Bulk supplement l-glutamine and creatine along with a scoop of DGC carb powder and a banana post workout and it's delicious! You can also have this pre-workout as instructed if you don't train in a fasted state. The majority of my supplements come from Bulk and so far they've never steered me wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Darren Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Blender required
customer_reviews.text: The taste is fine, but it does not mix well at all. It would probably go better if blending into a smoothie, but I just want to protein-up my non-dairy beverage. Sits on top in clumps, no matter how much I stir it. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: NH Runner

customer_reviews.title: Expensive. doesn't go very far. one/ two recipes ...
customer_reviews.text: Expensive. doesn't go very far. one/ two recipes and you're done. If you need this for recipes look at other option or get a larger wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I really love this protein powder. It taste awesome and is very filling. I mix it with almond milk and add a few frozen fruits then I am good to go. No longer hungry and have energy for a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Nana in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Making a dessert
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and could not find in grocery stores. It is for a delicious dessert that takes, cashews, almonds, coco, dates and egg white powder. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sue R. Yowell

customer_reviews.title: Hard to mix with water
customer_reviews.text: I only mix my egg white protein powder with water. However, comparing to other egg white protein powders in the market, this product hardly dissolves in water. And also the texture is strange and very flourish. It might be a good product if your intention is to use it with smoothies. Other than that, I’d say try others.
customer_reviews.author: Alp O.

customer_reviews.title: Protein powder without the neck muscle tension that whey protein can create.
customer_reviews.text: Using whey protein was increasing tension in my neck & shoulder muscles. With Bulk supplements egg white protein powder I vary between a mix of 25% whey protein powder / 75% egg white protein powder and 100% powder egg white protein powder. Reordering is easy and always with a fast delivery. Great product and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: keith duffy

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to replace whey protein,after discovering my dairy allergy.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace whey protein,after discovering my dairy allergy. This is best mixed with a smoothie; in plain water it develops a very frothy head after shaking.
customer_reviews.author: EricSilver

customer_reviews.title: Turns into a salty sponge cake once it hits water
customer_reviews.text: I tried two brands of egg white protein powder and this one is the worst. First of all, I'm mainly focused on the nutrients so I'm not rating the flavor. This powder is just difficult to consume. It is not soluble in water and sticks to the cup as well as the spoon if you're trying to mix it. I even put the powder in my mouth followed by water, then it sticks to my teeth more than goes down my throat. If you like salty and chewy sponge cake, maybe you'll like this powder.
customer_reviews.author: passeios

customer_reviews.title: Decent but a little salty. Must mix with other substances besides just water!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong taste. Hard to drink by itself with water but bearable in a blended fruit smoothie. Has a salty flavor. Don't expect this to taste good as this is more of a supplement than a food source. The biggest advantage is convenience. Otherwise, if you are looking for the same protein source that tastes good buy liquid egg whites from the store instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good protein
customer_reviews.text: I bought thi's to mix with my whey because I try to use more than 1 source of protein. It likes to stick to the lid of my blender bottle but I take and sprinkle whey on the lid so it can't. Otherwise I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: richard rieb

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to Mix
customer_reviews.text: The product is so sticky it's impossible to make a drink without coating everything involved. More importantly you can get it to mix into anything leaving a bunch of waste and clumpy paleo protein to deal with and clean up . Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: jaren turley

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it :(
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't not mix. Hot water it clumps disastrously and is chewy. Cold water and it's clumpy foam. Even mixed with other shakes, powders, juices, soups.... just nope.
customer_reviews.author: nicole m*

customer_reviews.title: Perfect basic protein
customer_reviews.text: Needed clean basic protein and this is perfect. Thank you bulk supplements
customer_reviews.author: avery

customer_reviews.title: Not a good powder
customer_reviews.text: Clumped and did not mix well. also made me nauseous.
customer_reviews.author: ABootthang

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by the Nutritionist
customer_reviews.text: My husband is currently undergoing chemo, and has lost 60lbs since April. He cannot use any protein powders containing whey. The nutritionist suggested egg white protein powder. We purchased this product and he has started it. We are both looking forward to seeing him build back up.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Pena

customer_reviews.title: Mixes easily and goes with anything
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and a great seller. Not sure how I can give a better compliment without sounding like a hack.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Skedaddle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: First egg white protein powder I have tried. I use it to make “bread.” It works great. Nice flavor, no egg smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great value, pure ingredient
customer_reviews.text: Pure, simple, and the best value for my money. This protein powder is my husband's go to product to increase his protein intake. I like that I am only paying for the ingredient that I want and not paying for fillers, binders, artificial colors, or flavors that I don't want. Bulkplements always ship fast.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany C.

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with this product
customer_reviews.text: My first time using. However this product is great, no off smells nor taste. It is messy to scoop out of package, gets all over your hands therefore it is wasteful. All and all no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Twila

customer_reviews.title: I use it every day, going to order some more
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, nothing but egg protein, no emulsifiers or fillers. Flavorless and mixes fine with other protein blends in a simple blender bottle with just water and almond milk. I'm ordering another 1kg bag now.
customer_reviews.author: James Muskopf

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't add flavor to whatever you're putting it in ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't add flavor to whatever you're putting it in, but it does add bulk and texture. I use this for homemade lara/rx bars.
customer_reviews.author: SaltySpouses

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I put about 15 grams in my normal shake, it didn't smell that great but once i mixed in the cacao powder i usually use i couldn't smell it anymore. it tasted a bit different but i got used to it. i was hoping to drink it before a workout but after drinking it i didn't feel too well. i felt nauseous. I am lactose intolerant but the package says there is no milk in it, it could have just been my stomach but I usually eat eggs with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great way to start the day
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for fruit smoothies. Stir it in at the end to prevent frothing.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Mccormack III

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, pure product that is reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: This product has exceeded my expectations thus far. Dissolves into my fruit shakes fast and smooth with no appreciable taste and is easily and quickly digestible. Without additives - a pure product. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dawndelion

customer_reviews.title: Good product but they need to make an organic version
customer_reviews.text: Mixes well. I like the product but they lose 2 stars for a lack of a bulk size to help the customer save money and for not having an organic option.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: All thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Thumbs up all the way around. Great products delivered on or before time. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Muleskinner

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had a very negative skin reaction to this product and it also irritated my stomach constantly making me feel like I have acid reflux.
customer_reviews.author: alexandra munoz

customer_reviews.title: Eggcelent
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit difficult to find a plain protein powder without vanilla or chocolate flavoring, so I was glad to find this one. I used it in a low-carb "Bisquick" recipe I found online. I made cheeseburger pie with it and it turned out great. Next I'd like to try it in my low-carb waffles. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: easy way to get eggs but can clump
customer_reviews.text: Easy way to get your egg whites in. I also add about 10 grams of whey isolate on the bottom on the shaker, just to help mix it all together, otherwise it tends to clump.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I got it to make my own RX Bar kind of things. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Black

customer_reviews.title: Mixes easy in a shake
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I make a protein shake every morning for breakfast and have tried a couple of different brands. Bulksupplements is great!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Hill Smith

customer_reviews.title: very good price for what you get!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this protein for one week and it seems to work. The price is very good, it mixes reasonably well and does not taste bad. I'm definitely gonna buy it again or check other products from Bulksupplements.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Egg white protein
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this egg white protein. Dissolves well in my smoothie. Great taste and consistency. Will order again and again!
customer_reviews.author: A. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Good packaging. I put this in a smoothie to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good packaging. I put this in a smoothie to add protein. I can't use whey protein. I use a combination of pea protein and the egg white. It has a good texture when I use the combination. If I just use the egg white protein, the texture becomes a little frothy. Always good products from Bulk Supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Burk

customer_reviews.title: Egg White Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: Liked it...made Orange Protein Pops-taste was good. carbs (1), calories (92) & protein (22) :)
customer_reviews.author: Bill Prendergast

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Wish it wasn't as messy and came with a scoop.
customer_reviews.text: The powder went whatever when I measured my eggwhites. Didn't have a scoop, and the zip seal broke..leaving me unable to close it. But all around, a good deal and product.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: this is great stuff. As far as taste goes
customer_reviews.text: As far as quality protein goes, this is great stuff. As far as taste goes, Its god awful. Its almost inedible with out some type of sugar taste additive. Normally I can take my protein with just water. This made me want to gag
customer_reviews.author: Erica Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great product. I have bought it several times, and will keep buying it. Great for lactose-intolerant people who can't handle whey protein.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Taste is obviously bland, but it does whats its supposed to. Cant beat the price. Only downside is the frothiness, but that is expected from an egg white protein. Also, doesn't mix well with very cold water. Use tap cold, then refrigerate until desired temp.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G Talarico

customer_reviews.title: Hard to drink.
customer_reviews.text: Bad mouth feel and clumps. Had an off taste that I could not mask with fruit. I ended up throwing it out.
customer_reviews.author: Christie P Huppert

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The taste is just not good. Decided to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great source of protein
customer_reviews.text: Great source of protein. I put it in my shake or smoothie. To me it doesn't affect the flavor at all. I love there products. Krill oil on the way from bulk. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Orlando A

customer_reviews.title: didn't mix well with anything ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find anything to mix this with. Whether it was fruit drinks (powdery), almond milk (too foamy), or just plain water (just didn't taste good), I just couldn't get a good mix, so I ended up throwing most of it away. I gave the protein isolate 5 stars (mixed well with almond milk), but this just didn't mix well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Grierson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use. It dissolves very well in water and has good nutritional value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: egg whites and cocoa powder) and it worked great. I've used other brands of powdered egg whites ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff to bake my own paleo protein bars (basically, bananas, egg whites and cocoa powder) and it worked great. I've used other brands of powdered egg whites that were about the same quality but more expensive. I'd definitely order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I actually used it to make keto egg white bread and it turned out good.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila G. Karmes

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy....pain in butt
customer_reviews.text: Way to powdery which led to clumping even with a Ninja blender. Would recommend Healthy n Fit Egg Protein as a better choice
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Is a good product. Does require a blender ball or 2 (even a blender depending on your consistency preference). But has an alright taste, wasn't as "eggy" as some said. I have been mixing with PB2 Or another protein powder to provide some flavor. Will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Foams when prepared in a shaker or mixer (because egg whites), eat that too (protein).
customer_reviews.text: Pure egg white protein always tastes unpleasant, but this one is quite bearable. Bought it many times, got used to the taste, can be masked with vanilla or chocolate or banana flavor, but even without additional flavoring it's edible. Great choice if you don't like or cannot eat whey.
customer_reviews.author: Uriel

customer_reviews.title: Good Protein Source
customer_reviews.text: Boughtvthis to make protein drinks without soy and artificial sweeteners. This is, ad the package states, egg whit protein. It mixes well with almond milk and does not interfer with any other flavors. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michele T

customer_reviews.title: Great for hitting macro goals
customer_reviews.text: This powder is a great addition when trying to hit macro goals. It can clump up a bit when mixed in cold liquid and not blended. Overall very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this product.  Will Buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Good for adding protein zoo a fruit/veg smoothie which keeps the calories down.
customer_reviews.author: mmb

customer_reviews.title: Love this protein
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein, no taste at all that I can tell and adds a smooth creaminess to my smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: I love that the product is free of added sugar
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Egg White Protein so we can add more protein in our diet. I love that the product is free of added sugar, soy, yeast or additives. The taste is fine for us, but the kids were used to getting the flavored vanilla protein flavor. I made a smoothie for my kids and added a little bit of vanilla extract and that helped quite a bit. If you're not picky about flavors, this is a great product. I would certainly buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna L. Wellman

customer_reviews.title: simple protein that you don't taste and is very fine so it never gets chunky
customer_reviews.text: simple protein that you don't taste and is very fine so it never gets chunky. really great for anyone with digestive sensitivity to large amounts of whey or other milk proteins.
customer_reviews.author: Nick P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best price you can find on egg white protein powder and great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer - Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I don't like whey because it has adverse effects on me so ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't mix well and the taste is a bit strange. I don't like whey because it has adverse effects on me so tried this out. However due to taste and mixing I may just deal with whey from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Source of Protein
customer_reviews.text: MY 18 year old and I use this in everything! From pancakes to shakes. No weird taste to it. Love that the product packaging is not so bulky. It makes it easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Ninadoll

customer_reviews.title: The product mixes very well. It has a very ...
customer_reviews.text: The product mixes very well. It has a very slight neutral taste (can't really describe it). Not a deal breaker, because of the high quality of the product...but that is my reason for 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: kristi lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has a very salty taste and is difficult to mix without a blender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: mixes well once shaken, which is unusual in egg proteins.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Clumps
customer_reviews.text: The protein drink clumps . . Hire a Chemist !!! . Do not waste people's money .
customer_reviews.author: la1000fitness

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping on great product with awesome price. What more could you ask for? Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to mix, taste is strong and gross. Basically undrinkable.
customer_reviews.author: Mkcwe29

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, best price
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, best price. I recommend blending about 30g with half of a root beer or orange soda and shot or two of cream. Tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, mixes well and was not too salty ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a small one and mixed with water only. Good taste, mixes well and was not too salty like others.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Winter

customer_reviews.title: Use for low carb recipes
customer_reviews.text: This works great in my low carb cooking and baking.
customer_reviews.author: Radkison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this product. High quality, no fillers, and mixes well.
customer_reviews.author: scottn941

customer_reviews.text: difficult to mix by stirring --- clumbs in little balls instead of dissolving --- maybe this product works better in a blender?
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is inconvenient (a puff of protein fills the air!) but it's tasteless and dissolves well.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I can see results already. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Shari W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best protein supplement ever. Low calorie. No taste. Easily dissolves. Great price. Now my go-to brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great for customizing your shakes!
customer_reviews.text: I like this protein powder because it taste like what you mix into it, not the egg powder itself. This is nice because it allows for a lot of variety of mixes. Creates a fruit smoothie when you throw in some ice or frozen berries. If you want vanilla, get some vanilla extract and Swerve brand Erythritol to sweeten it up and throw in a banana and a little cinnamon sprinkled on top and boom! Chocolate, ok, throw in some Swerve again with cocoa powder, done. Nice thing is you can add as much of this egg protein to the mix to make it as heavy or light as you want. Really good choice if you like customizing your shakes!
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: An easy clean protein
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein! Dissolves easily, blends nicely and doesn't affect taste of smoothies or shakes at all. A great clean option!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pure protein!!
customer_reviews.text: It was great.. pure and mixes very well with a collagen supplement. I would order again

customer_reviews.text: Recommended by holistic doctor. It's fairly clean tasting but prefer Bulksupplements Pure Grass-Fed Whey Protein Isolate Powder.

customer_reviews.title: Good if you use it right
customer_reviews.text: Great protein for oatmeal! Don't recommend in smoothies because it does have a salty taste. It's ok if you're doing a chocolate smoothie though.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Fisher
